If I had to go through the current verification process I wouldn't even bother.  Probably.

Title: Review: LKP: Suzie + Jenny
Date: Jul 7, 2022

State: PA

Age Estimate: 20s/30s
Nationality: Korean
Physical Description: Slim and pretty
Click to unlock the hidden Private Details in this review
Recommendation: Yes

I have had doubles before.  Just double the price and you get both ladies.  This is available almost everywhere if the schedules allow it.  

The key is, are they really into each other along with you.  They can't be too into each other while ignoring you too.  Beside my one 1 experience it was sort of like a tag-team match where the one lady would be working on you while the other would sort of, take a break and kind of sit out.  Then the off gal would tag back in.   While nice, it was almost like the gal would do half the work and each would get the full money.  

Only that 1 time was it a true 3-some experience and that was a long long time ago.  Kind of spoiled me forever.
Leaving out if they are interactive is weak
If you are asking if they were interactive with each other, then no. All focus was towards me.

I think a threesome can be great - but I suppose it could also not be...  My last one was not with AMP girls, instead it was with two civvies - middle aged and over sexed - they took turns BBBJ and making out with me while played with their pussies.  Weirdly I felt bad that I had to choose which one was going to get my load at the end. I made a choice.
Is there a website?  I also saw her at CP some time ago.
https:/
Thanks for a more useful review of the new place.  But on behalf of mankind that's quite the disappointment.
